How to install:
1. Run MysteryPI - Lost in Los Angeles_setup.exe

3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

A Hollywood blockbuster vanishes the day before its big premiere in Mystery P.I. - Lost in Los Angeles! You, a world famous Mystery P.I., have been hired to track down and return the lost movie. Seek & find over 2100 hidden objects in 25 stunning L.A. locations, like Malibu Beach, Rodeo Drive, movie sets, Hollywood hot spots and many more. Hurry - you only have 17 hours to find the missing flick or the studio will be ruined! Try all three addictive ways to play: solve the mystery, collect all the keys and film reels, and unlock a special match 3 puzzle mode. Play the newest game in the hit Mystery P.I. series and get lost in Los Angeles today!
